### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.corriere.it/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.corriere.it%2F) ### Comment > IL SITO DEL CORRIERE DELLA SERA DICE DI SBLOCCARE ADGUARD, MA MALGRADO ABBIA INSERITO L'URL NELL'ELENCO DEI SITI DA NON FILTRARE IN ADGUARD CONTINUA AD USCIRE QUESTA SCHERMATA. issue.title: 0x41c21693e60fc1a5dbb7c50e54e7a6016aa44c99.xyz
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://0x41c21693e60fc1a5dbb7c50e54e7a6016aa44c99.xyz/Rrrrr/console/modal/index.php?wallet=Metamask](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F0x41c21693e60fc1a5dbb7c50e54e7a6016aa44c99.xyz%2FRrrrr%2Fconsole%2Fmodal%2Findex.php%3Fwallet%3DMetamask) ### Comment > The link found from https://t.me/avaxmim of https://avamim.xyz/ in last year. The telegram account is scamming at present. Their quoted link (https://0x41c21693e60fc1a5dbb7c50e54e7a6016aa44c99.xyz/Rrrrr/) wants to someone seed-code of Wallet address. And I am reporting it to detect blocking it. Thank you ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
